name: Southern Nights
content: Have you ever felt a southern night
Just as good even when closed your eyes
That he has found a better way hey
Have you ever noticed southern skies
It goes running thru your soul
Like the stories told of old
Every flower touched his cold hand
As he slowly walked by weeping willows
La Da Da Da Da Da
La Da Da Da Da Da
Da Da Da Da Da Da Da Da Da Da Da
They feel so good it's frightening
La Da Da Da Da Da
La Da Da Da Da Da
Da Da Da Da Da Da Da Da Da Da Da
Have you ever felt a southern night
Just as good even when closed your eyes
You know I'm willing want to
That he has found a better way
Have you ever noticed southern Skies
